name: DeviantArt - 2000 Style Profile Page
description: Give Profile Pages a 2000-inspired Look. Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+" (if modified). Not Compatible with "Style Profile Page" Family Script.

user.name: Zigaudrey
user.about: A person who creates CSS style because there are things I don't agree.

additional_info:
NOTE
If you are using "Eclipse Exp+", remove/disable the line with the classes "._2L0cL .l_7z8 " and "._2L0cL ._2Q3jU".

DESCRIPTION
Work with Green and Light theme (because of text color) and while Log Out
Turn profile page into a one Widgets Column.
Remove Comment section under Post and Watch Button 
Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+"
Not Compatible with "Style Profile Page" Family Script

UPDATE:
-Fixed Texts Color in Widget, now it wouldn't be an issue reading them when changing theme
-Fixed Code for Legacy Journal and added color for Interest Text, even for Log Out
